name: Explored Executable
short_description:
Explored is a Computer Restorer, able to use in any computer. Useful when someone has stolen your computer, once opened it up, pc makes in useless but data, files and information keep stored in hard drive.
Suggestions:
Make a shortcut called Google Chrome or any browser, and replace the icon to the Google Chrome's one, or with any stuff you have in your computer. Then make sure you'll not open it. 
Watch my youtube channel, in which I make suggestions and tricks to use.

CAUTION:
The file is not a installer, do not open it once downloaded, although a setup file will be uploaded soon.

I'M NOT Responsible of the hack use of the software.

JUST AVAILABLE For Windows.
